title: Boards Community Battle Academia Fanart Contest!

replies.body:
This is so awesome, wish I was a skilled at drawing so I could participate, but thankfully people like that exist and can't wait to see what people come up with. Love what you guys are doing here. <3
 {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Truth is we're our own worst critics, and even if you aren't all that experienced or skilled yet, the only way to improve is to keep on practising!

We'd still love to see your art, even if it's just a stick figure! These contests are about celebrating the community as much as they are about winning cool prizes, so go for it :)
If people can draw a line and put it into a museum then im sure u can do it :)
Yea, thousands of years from now. And it might become a historic study of abilities.
Right??
I have been drawing 2-3 hours a day in the past 2 months so I could enter this!!!! and it is OPEN!!!!
Good luck! Can't wait to see what you have for us!
Finally, after like 3 weeks of hard work, I have submitted it!!! Please let me know if it has been received.
Your entry has been received!

I would participate, but I kinda have assignments to do and 2 drawings to start, welp just gotta support my friends with their drawings then.
{{sticker:sg-kiko}}
Ok well prepare for one of the worse drawings ever
Show us what you've got!
Submitted, not to brag but it's probably a guaranteed 1st place{{sticker:sg-ezreal}}
It's _fantastic_.
Amazing xD

# !! We have removed the rule regarding aspect ratio after some consideration. You may see the restriction on some future contests, but for this one, the timeline was too short to really accomplish what we wanted from that particular rule. You are free to submit in whatever aspect ratio you wish. !!
Just out of curiosity, what did you want to achieve with that rule?
We were looking at things like special features for this contest but the timeframe ended up being way too small. It's definitely something we'll be exploring in the future though :)
Best of luck to everyone who has entered! {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

Just submitted! Hope I made it on time, sorry I accidentally submitted the wrong link the first time so it won't direct you to the artwork. Please check my second submission for the link (had to resubmit because I closed my edit response window), really sorry about that. it is not two separate entries.

I was curious that if we did place 1st,2nd or 3rd and received the Battle Academia skin of choice, would the prizes be given out in time to purchase their respective chroma bundles/skin bundles? Or will the event end before they're given out?

I believe we took that into consideration but since we posted the comp before the event actually went live some things weren't confirmed, I'll double check on that.

EDIT: We've made some arrangements and will speed up our selection process so winners can be announced and prized with enough time to purchase bundles if they wish.
Thank you! Also, if the entry has already been submitted but we want to change the prize we want should we just let you know after the winners are announced or resubmit our entry now?
Resubmit your entry, and assuming the artwork is the same we will use the latest valid entry :)
I am going into hospital tomorrow so it is not as polished as I would like, but I've entered now! I can't afford the skins but hopefully if I win I can buy a chroma xx

Hey just wondering but is it possible to resubmit a piece?  {{sticker:sg-janna}} I submitted mine earlier but I've noticed a few mistakes and fixed them up now, just wondering if there was a way to resubmit/delete the old submission? Since there's a one submit limit, I don't want to accidentally breach the rules!
I just submitted my (mediocre ;-;) artwork, was it submitted properly? I've never used imgur >_>
We've received your artwork just fine :) Looks great!

Hey all,
I have an image i'd love to submit but it does not meet the 1920x1080 (or multiples of, e.g 3840x2160) resolution requirements. Is there any way I could get around this or is it a hard and fast rule
Thanks!
- Cat{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

To be eligible for the prizes it is a hard and fast rule, so crop or adjust if you can. 

If you can't, we'd still love to see your artwork, and we can still include it in the gallery once the contest closes! Unfortunately, you won't be able to win any of those juicy prizes this way.

Thankyou!
Silly me drew a potrait so it'll be a challenge to put into those dimensions
Is it possible to do a 1080x1920 or must it be 1920x1080. Sorry for the silly questions!! Thanks heaps
- Cat

Questions are more than welcome :)

This contest was designed with backgrounds/wallpapers in mind, so I'm afraid you'll have to conform to those ratios.

Alright alright, you've convinced me- I'll draw another piece!
Thanks heaps! :)

Alright now hold up there. I had a chat with our contact at Riot about that particular rule. Originally there were some particular plans for a gallery type deal that required artworks to be in background format. 

However, those plans were always tentative, so while this may be a restriction for future contests, given that the timeline for this contest was short, we have made the decision to rescind that particular rule this time, so you can submit your portrait piece :)

Wow! Thanks so much
Bittersweet, however, because I was very excited to have an excuse to draw instead of studying. Alas, i will submit my original piece!
Thanks heaps <3

Also just checking that my submission is in? I get super paranoid with this stuff. Uploaded to imgur and submitted but you never know if it goes through xd

We'll certainly accept a second entry, though only the first will be used for prizing ;)

Your entry has come through just fine and you are much better at hair that I could ever hope to be!

Best of luck!
Use a graphic editing software to scale it down, and crop it if you must.
time to break out the tablet then
